group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The ALSPAC study has ethical approval. Specific ethical approval for this particular project was not required, but permission to undertake the research was granted by the ALSPAC executive committee.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: TRG reports funding from Sanofi, Biogen, and GlaxoSmithKline for projects unrelated to the work presented in this manuscript.

assertion.value: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
